title: About Me
text:
With over 12 years of experience in market research and social services, Iâ€™ve successfully led various market research and survey projects. These projects honed my skills in quantitative and qualitative research methods, statistical reasoning, and project management.
With a Masterâ€™s degree in Public Administration and a Business Intelligence and Data Analytics Certification, I have a strong understanding of the theoretical foundation of data analysis, which I apply to real-world business problems.

My attention to detail and accuracy has been commended by my supervisors and colleagues alike.
As I transition into the world of data, I am eager to apply my research background to a corporate setting. I am particularly interested in roles that allow me to analyze consumer data to optimize product development and marketing strategies. I am ready to leverage my analytical expertise to make a tangible impact on business growth.
Iâ€™m actively seeking opportunities, and my passion for AI and data science drives my desire to make a meaningful contribution.
I look forward to connecting with new professionals. Feel free to add me on LinkedIn or email me at zarbi786@gmail.com.
